text: hi I'm Charles and I'd like to show you
what style dictionary can do for you
here in the upper right of my screen you
can see the iOS app that I built
and here it is an Android
and here's our style documentation
showing our primary and secondary brand
colors and our font sizes okay now that
you've seen the app let's make some
changes I'm going to bump up the font
size for readability
okay and let's up this one and I'm
switching the font to one that has a
better feel of what I'm going for and
let's change the theme from a blue to an
orange feel
and change this out for red okay now I
save the style dictionary and all the
styles and documentation rebuild
all right so let's go rebuild our iOS
app
you can see the app icon has changed
here and when we go into the app all of
the text changes and color changes are
present let's do the same thing to
Android and rebuild it here
and our whole app is up to date and the
icon changes and of course our style
documentation the primary and secondary
brand colors are now correct and the
font sizes are now reflected I hope that
gives you a sense of what style
Dictionary can provide in terms of
end-to-end reliability of your design
and consistency across all platforms we
hope that this helps you in your own
projects and would love to hear your
thoughts and suggestions
